```{js, echo=FALSE}
// Simple scrollytelling for background map
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
    entries.forEach((entry) => {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        // Remove active class from all steps
        document.querySelectorAll('.step').forEach(step => {
          step.classList.remove('active');
        });
        
        // Add active class to current step
        entry.target.classList.add('active');
        
        // Update map
        if (typeof window.updateMapStep === 'function') {
          window.updateMapStep(entry.target.id);
        }
      }
    });
  }, {
    threshold: 0.6
  });

  // Observe all steps
  document.querySelectorAll('.step').forEach(step => {
    observer.observe(step);
  });
});
```


::: {.intro-section}
I'm Kylie, an Atlanta-native (technically Decatur), crazy dog lady, runner, and science nerd. I work as an infectious disease modeller, meaning that I use math, stats, and R to study the spread of diseases and how interventions, like vaccines, can impact that spread. My career path has taken me from Atlanta to London, Amsterdam, Hong Kong, and soon to Melbourne. I love to explore both near and far, whether that's through research collaborations, weekend hikes, discovering local coffee shops, or finding the best running trails in each new city.

Scroll through my journey below and watch it unfold on the map.
:::

During the pandemic, I relocated to Amsterdam and joined the RIVM as a senior researcher in infectious disease modelling. Found my niche in modelling for public health policy.

Joined University of Hong Kong School of Public Health as Honorary Assistant Professor, expanding international research collaborations and working on real-world vaccine effectiveness.

```{r map, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

# Create map with attractive tiles
map <- leaflet() %>%
  # Use CartoDB Positron for a clean, minimal look
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>%
  setView(lng = 30, lat = 20, zoom = 2)

htmlwidgets::onRender(map, "
function(el, x) {
  window.journeyMap = this;
  
  // Disable map interaction
  this.dragging.disable();
  this.touchZoom.disable();
  this.doubleClickZoom.disable();
  this.scrollWheelZoom.disable();
  this.boxZoom.disable();
  this.keyboard.disable();
  if (this.tap) this.tap.disable();
  
  // Locations with optimized zoom levels for smooth transitions
  window.locations = {
    atlanta: {lng: -84.296, lat: 33.749, zoom: 6},
    london: {lng: -0.1276, lat: 51.5074, zoom: 6},
    amsterdam: {lng: 4.9041, lat: 52.3676, zoom: 6},
    hongkong: {lng: 114.1694, lat: 22.3193, zoom: 5},
    melbourne: {lng: 144.9631, lat: -37.8136, zoom: 6},
    overview: {lng: 30, lat: 20, zoom: 2}
  };
  
  window.currentMarkers = [];
  
  // Enhanced marker creation with better styling
  var createMarker = function(lat, lng, popup, isPrimary) {
    var size = isPrimary ? 28 : 18;
    var color = isPrimary ? '#2DD4BF' : '#A7F3D0';
    var pulseAnim = isPrimary ? 'animation: pulse 2s infinite;' : '';
    
    var icon = L.divIcon({
      html: '<div style=\"background: ' + color + '; width: ' + size + 'px; height: ' + size + 'px; border-radius: 50%; border: 3px solid #FFFFFF; box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(45,212,191,0.5); ' + pulseAnim + '\"></div><style>@keyframes pulse { 0% { transform: scale(1); box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(45,212,191,0.5); } 50% { transform: scale(1.15); box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(45,212,191,0.7); } 100% { transform: scale(1); box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(45,212,191,0.5); } }</style>',
      iconSize: [size, size],
      className: 'journey-marker'
    });
    
    var marker = L.marker([lat, lng], {icon: icon}).bindPopup(popup, {
      className: 'custom-popup'
    });
    window.currentMarkers.push(marker);
    return marker;
  };
  
  // Smooth transition function
  var smoothFlyTo = function(lat, lng, zoom) {
    window.journeyMap.flyTo([lat, lng], zoom, {
      animate: true,
      duration: 2.5,
      easeLinearity: 0.1
    });
  };
  
  window.updateMapStep = function(stepId) {
    var map = window.journeyMap;
    
    // Clear everything and rebuild to ensure proper primary/secondary states
    window.currentMarkers.forEach(function(marker) {
      map.removeLayer(marker);
    });
    window.currentMarkers = [];
    
    map.eachLayer(function(layer) {
      if (layer._latlngs) {
        map.removeLayer(layer);
      }
    });
    
    switch(stepId) {
      case 'step-atlanta':
        smoothFlyTo(window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng, window.locations.atlanta.zoom);
        setTimeout(function() {
          createMarker(window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng, 
                      '<strong>Atlanta, GA</strong><br>PhD at Emory University<br>(2011-2018)', true).addTo(map);
        }, 1000);
        break;
        
      case 'step-london':
        smoothFlyTo(window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng, window.locations.london.zoom);
        setTimeout(function() {
          // Add previous markers (dimmed) and current (primary)
          createMarker(window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng, 
                      '<strong>Atlanta, GA</strong><br>PhD completed', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng, 
                      '<strong>London, UK</strong><br>Postdoc at Imperial College<br>(2018-2020)', true).addTo(map);
          
          // Add journey line
          L.polyline([[window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng], 
                     [window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng]], 
                     {color: '#2DD4BF', weight: 4, opacity: 0.8}).addTo(map);
        }, 1000);
        break;
        
      case 'step-amsterdam':
        smoothFlyTo(window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng, window.locations.amsterdam.zoom);
        setTimeout(function() {
          // Add all previous markers (dimmed) and current (primary)
          createMarker(window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng, 
                      '<strong>Atlanta, GA</strong><br>PhD completed', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng, 
                      '<strong>London, UK</strong><br>Postdoc completed', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng, 
                      '<strong>Amsterdam, NL</strong><br>Senior Researcher at RIVM<br>(2020-Present)', true).addTo(map);
          
          // Add complete journey line
          L.polyline([[window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng], 
                     [window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng],
                     [window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng]], 
                     {color: '#2DD4BF', weight: 4, opacity: 0.8}).addTo(map);
        }, 1000);
        break;
        
      case 'step-hongkong':
        smoothFlyTo(window.locations.hongkong.lat, window.locations.hongkong.lng, window.locations.hongkong.zoom);
        setTimeout(function() {
          // Add all previous markers
          createMarker(window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng, 
                      '<strong>Atlanta, GA</strong><br>PhD completed', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng, 
                      '<strong>London, UK</strong><br>Postdoc completed', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng, 
                      '<strong>Amsterdam, NL</strong><br>Home base at RIVM', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.hongkong.lat, window.locations.hongkong.lng, 
                      '<strong>Hong Kong</strong><br>Honorary Assistant Professor<br>University of Hong Kong<br>(2022-Present)', true).addTo(map);
          
          // Add main journey line
          L.polyline([[window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng], 
                     [window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng],
                     [window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng]], 
                     {color: '#2DD4BF', weight: 4, opacity: 0.8}).addTo(map);
          
          // Add collaboration line
          L.polyline([[window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng], 
                     [window.locations.hongkong.lat, window.locations.hongkong.lng]], 
                     {color: '#14B8A6', weight: 3, opacity: 0.7, dashArray: '10,5'}).addTo(map);
        }, 1000);
        break;
        
      case 'step-melbourne':
        smoothFlyTo(window.locations.melbourne.lat, window.locations.melbourne.lng, window.locations.melbourne.zoom);
        setTimeout(function() {
          // Add all previous markers
          createMarker(window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng, 
                      '<strong>Atlanta, GA</strong><br>PhD completed', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng, 
                      '<strong>London, UK</strong><br>Postdoc completed', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng, 
                      '<strong>Amsterdam, NL</strong><br>Current position at RIVM', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.hongkong.lat, window.locations.hongkong.lng, 
                      '<strong>Hong Kong</strong><br>Ongoing collaboration', false).addTo(map);
          createMarker(window.locations.melbourne.lat, window.locations.melbourne.lng, 
                      '<strong>Melbourne, AU</strong><br>University of Melbourne<br>Modelling for Policy Lead<br>(Coming Soon!)', true).addTo(map);
          
          // Add main journey line
          L.polyline([[window.locations.atlanta.lat, window.locations.atlanta.lng], 
                     [window.locations.london.lat, window.locations.london.lng],
                     [window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng]], 
                     {color: '#2DD4BF', weight: 4, opacity: 0.8}).addTo(map);
          
          // Add collaboration line
          L.polyline([[window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng], 
                     [window.locations.hongkong.lat, window.locations.hongkong.lng]], 
                     {color: '#14B8A6', weight: 3, opacity: 0.7, dashArray: '10,5'}).addTo(map);
          
          // Add future connection
          L.polyline([[window.locations.amsterdam.lat, window.locations.amsterdam.lng], 
                     [window.locations.melbourne.lat, window.locations.melbourne.lng]], 
                     {color: '#5EEAD4', weight: 3, opacity: 0.6, dashArray: '15,8'}).addTo(map);
        }, 1000);
        break;
        
      default:
        smoothFlyTo(window.locations.overview.lat, window.locations.overview.lng, window.locations.overview.zoom);
        break;
    }
  };
}
")

# Number of publications from Google Scholar
library(scholar)
library(dplyr)

# Calculate publications count
scholar_id <- "gfJENK8AAAAJ" 
# Get publications count (removing duplicates)
pub_count <- tryCatch({
  pubs <- get_publications(scholar_id)
  unique_pubs <- pubs %>%
    distinct(title, .keep_all = TRUE)
  nrow(unique_pubs)
}, error = function(e) {
  40  # Fallback
})

# Get total citations
total_citations <- tryCatch({
  profile <- get_profile(scholar_id)
  profile$total_cites
}, error = function(e) {
  15000  # Fallback
})
```
